intro.p: If you want to discuss or ask questions, you can use our mailing lists. Please use the appropriate list depending on what you want to do.

section.title: Announcements
section.p: The announcements list is for the project's public announcements. Very low-traffic.

section.title: Development
section.p: For more in depth discussions with the committers. Use this list to send patches. Medium traffic. Please refrain from using this list to ask common usage questions. Use the forum or the user list instead.
